College_Summary: Er. Perumal Manimekalai Polytechnic College located at Hosur in Tamil Nadu was established on 1996. It was established by Er. P Perumal, Founder & Chairman and sponsored by the Er. Perumal Manimekalai Telugu Minority Educational and Charitable Trust. The college offers admission to the diploma programs in the engineering domain. It has been preparing leaders in technology and management over the past 20 years. The college provides value added technical education especially to the rural society. Er. Perumal Manimekalai Polytechnic College offers excellent infrastructure and facilities to its student population of about 1450.

Adhiyamaan Polytechnic College is a self-financing college established in 1995. It is located in Hosur, Tamil Nadu. The college is affiliated with the Directorate of Technical Education (DoTE), Chennai. It has so far completed 10 academic years and 8 batches of Diploma holders.

Cheyyar Polytechnic College is a private Polytechnic College managed and operated by the Sri Raghavendra Education Trust since 1998. It is located in Vandavasi, Tamil Nadu. The college offers 3-year polytechnic courses in five specializations. There is no need to qualify for an entrance test to be eligible for admission.

Apollo Polytechnic College, a part of the Apollo Group of Educational Institutions is a private polytechnic institute established in the year 2010. It is approved by the Govt. of Tamil Nadu and affiliated to DOTE. The institute offers Diploma in Engineering across six different specializations. The students are provided with lucrative jobs in esteemed organizations.

College_Name: Er. Perumal Manimekalai Polytechnic College, Hosur

College_Summary: Bharath Polytechnic College was established in 1947 and is situated at Manickampalayam on the State highway between Tiruchengode and Namakkal, Tamilnadu. The college is recognized by All India Council For Technical Education (AICTE) New Delhi and Govt. of Tamilnadu and is also affiliated to Directorate of Technical Education Chennai (DTE Chennai), this institute is ideal for young minds.

FX Polytechnic College is a renowned private institution established on 2006 in Tirunelveli, Southern Tamil Nadu. The institute runs under St. Xavier’s Educational Trust. The main objective of the institute is to encourage the holistic development of the students and to encourage the students to serve the humanity. The college offers 6 specialized Diploma courses. Admission to the college is purely based on the marks obtained in the previous qualifying examination. Cooperate Giants like Hinduja Foundries, Yamaha, Nokia, Hitachi, and BOSCH visit the campus and recruit the students every year.

Everest Polytechnic College (EPC) was established by the Everest Educational Trust in the year 2009 to uplift the oppressed and economically backward classes to impart quality education. The motto of the college is to serve the students with World-level technical education for sharpening their technical knowledge and skills. The college offers diploma courses in various specializations. Admission into the college doesn’t require any ranking in the entrances. The college provides the basic facilities like well-furnished library, Hostel, and transport facilities, etc.

College_Name: Sri Bharathi Polytechni College For Women, Pudukkottai
College_Summary: Annai College of Polytechnic, established in 2008 and is one of the most popular polytechnic colleges in Kumbakonam, Thanjavur, Tamil Nadu. Ever since its inception, it has grown exponentially and now boasts a student strength of more than 2000. It is affiliated to the Department of Technical Education (DOTE) and approved by AICTE. The college is frequented by employers such as Royal Enfield, Nippon, Eureka Forbes, Up to Date and many more. Their students continue to get good academic results in national as well as regional competitions.

College_Name: The Surabi College Of Polytechnic, Namakkal

College_Summary: Excel Polytechnic College is one of the institutions developed by Sri Rengaswamy Educational Trust (SRET) in the year 2008. It is approved by the Government of Tamil Nadu, Directorate of Technical Education, Chennai (DTE) and All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. The institute offers full-time diploma courses under 8 specializations. The institution provides innovative technical education to the students with a speciality of 100% placements. Though the college offers diploma courses, the infrastructure of the college is as good as an engineering college.

Golden Polytechnic College (GPC) is a private institution located in Salem, Tamil Nadu. It was established in 2010. It is affiliated to the Directorate of Technical Education (DTE), Chennai. The Institute is working with a vision to revive the traditional heritage in the various Spiritual, Cultural, Educational and Technical areas.

Gandhi Polytechnic college was established in the year of 2008. It is situated on the Sathya - Coimbatore Highway at about 10 Km from Sathya Mangalam, Erode District in Tamil Nadu. The Gandhi Polytechnic College is approved by AICTE, New Delhi and is affiliated to Department of Technical Education Chennai, Tamil Nadu. The institution offers diploma courses under varied specializations. The college commits to provide high quality technical education and it excels in developing knowledge, skill, and character of the students.

AKT Memorial Polytechnic College is a private institute situated in Kallakurichi, Tamil Nadu that got established in 2008. The institute is approved by AICTE, New Delhi and Government of Tamil Nadu., AKT Memorial Polytechnic College is a part of AKT Memorial Educational Institutions and has been affiliated to DOTE Chennai.

Aishwarya Polytechnic College was established in 2009 in Erode, Tamil Nadu. The college is known for its sprawling campus and facilities that it offers. Education imparted here focuses on holistic learning, practical training and skill development.

College_Name: Sir Issac Newton Polytechnic College, Nagapattinam

College_Summary: Sri Sakthi Polytechnic College is a private Co-Ed institute at Chengam in Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu. The college commits to provide high quality technical education to the students by offering 5 diploma courses in the stream of Engineering. The college has a subject named DAT (Diploma in Agricultural Technology) which is one of its kind in the region. The college is proud to declare that it has 100 percent placement record since 2012. The college is spread across 8 acres and the atmosphere is clean and productive for the students to concentrate and study.

College_Name: Sri Rajiv Gandhi Polytechnic college, Erode

College_Summary: G.P Polytechnic College comes in one of the prominent and significant colleges in Tamil Nadu. The college is the major centre of education and innovation, every course provides hands – on training to students and helps them to understand the topic in a better way.

College_Name: Sri. S. Ramasamy Naidu Memorial Polytechnic College-[SSRNMPC], Sattur
Shree Venkateshwara Hi-Tech Polytechnic College-[SVHTPC], Erode

College_Summary: E.G.S Pillay Polytechnic College, Nagapattinam was established in the year 2011 by EGS Pillay and Sons Educational & Charitable Trust. It is a Self-Financing polytechnic college in Tamil Nadu affiliated to DOTE, Chennai.

College_Name: Dakshina Bharat Hindi Prachar Sabha, Chennai
College_Summary: Hindustan Polytechnic College, Coimbatore is an institute offering Polytechnic courses across 6 disciplines at the UG level. Admission to the courses offered are done based on the candidate’s performance in the previous qualifying examination. The total course fee is INR 90,000. Some of the top recruiters that recruit students from the Hindustan Polytechnic College include Larsen & Toubro Ltd. Quest, Midas, Accel, Essar Steels among various others.

College_Name: Sri Ramanas ABC Polytechnic College-[SRABCPC], Dindigul

College_Summary: Ammaiappar Polytechnic College(APC) is an ISO 9001-2015 certified Institution. (APC) was established in the year of 2013, located in the district of Virudhanagar, Tamil Nadu. (APC) is approved by (AICTE) New Delhi and affiliated by The Directorate of Technical Education (DOTE), Chennai. (APC) is spread across 12 Acres of Land with Distinctive sections of Classrooms,Labs,Canteen etc. (APC) set their sight at providing the Best Education, Knowledge, Training resources and high quality Practical Exposure for Experiments and Training methods. The Faculty of the college are very Approachable and Helpful to ensure that the students are acquiring the Latest, right and Logical Knowledge. The College offers Placement, Scholarship and other Facilities to the Students.

AKY Polytechnic College is an Engineering College situated in the state of Tamil Nadu in the city Tirunelveli. The College was established in 2015 with an aim to impart quality education in the field of engineering and technology to the students belonging from the rural areas of Tirunelveli, Tuticorin and Kanyakumari along with practical skills as well.

College_Name: Sri Andal Nachiyar Polytechnic College-[SANPC], Thoothukudi

College_Summary: Nehru Group of Institutions (NGI), Tamil Nadu & Kerala was established in 1968 in Kuniamuthur, Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. NGI was set up with the objective of providing higher education in the field of Aeronautical Engineering to the students of Tamil Nadu and Kerala. The institution offers undergraduate, postgraduate and doctorate courses in the discipline of Management, Arts, Science, Paramedical Sciences, Engineering and Hospitality. It has also started pre-school education for kids.

Sona Medical College offers an undergraduate program in the discipline of Naturopathy and Yoga. Admission is done on the basis of merit.

Sri Ramachandra College of Engineering and Technology (SRET) is located in Chennai. It is affiliated to the Sri Ramachandra Institute of Higher Education and Research and approved by AICTE and UGC. SRET offers B.Tech, B.Sc, and M.Sc programs in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Data Analytics, Cyber Security, IOT, Medical Engineering. Admission is done on the basis of merit.

Ironwood Sports Management Global Academy (ISMGA), Chennai is an initiative by Greycells Education Ltd. offering postgraduate diplomas in the field of Sports Management. ISMGA serves as a niche where students can not only get professional training and exposure but also let their creativity sprout by participating in their global immersion program. Ironwood Sports Management has a twin institute located at Mumbai.

Jeppiaar offers are B.Com, B.Sc, BBA, B.A. English and Diploma Courses in the stream of Arts. Admission to the institute is done on the basis of merit. The candidates can fill the application form through online mode.

College_Summary: SRM Institute of Science and Technology (SRMIST), Tiruchirappalli is one of the top ranking universities in India. The institute is recognized by the Ministry of HRD and is approved by AICTE. SRMIST offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and diploma courses in the discipline of Science, Engineering, Commerce and Management. Admission to SRMIST Trichy is done on the basis of JEE Main or SRMJEEE conducted by the institute. In addition to this, SRMIST has a dedicated Training and Placement cell which provides 100% placement assistance to its students. Some of the top recruiters at SRMIST Trichy are Amazon, Infosys, Accenture, Wipro, HCL Technologies, Union Bank, etc.

College_Summary: Hindusthan School of Architecture (HSOA), Coimbatore offers a flagship course of B.Arch. The course is divided into 2 parts, the first part is from the first semester to the sixth semester, awarding the Degree of Bachelor of Building Science and the second part is from the seventh semester to the tenth Semester, awarding the degree of Bachelor of Architecture. Total fee for the B.Arch program in HSOA is INR 7.50 Lacs. Admission is on the basis of valid NATA scores.

College_Name: Sona College of Arts and Science, Salem
College_Summary: Hindustan College of Nursing (HCON), Coimbatore offers B.Sc at UG level, M.Sc at PG level and P.B.B.Sc in Nursing. Admission to the courses offered is based on the candidate's performance in the previous qualifying examination.The total fees for HCON B.Sc program is INR 4 Lacs. The Placement Advisory Team, popularly known as Corporate Relations on the Nursing College, aims at providing the best opportunities enabling every student to realize their dream.

College_Name: Ironwood Sports Management Global Academy Chennai
College_Summary: Hindusthan College of Health Sciences, Coimbatore, is a part of the Hindusthan Educational and Charitable Trust and offers one UG program in the field of Health Sciences. The college runs the B.Sc across six specializations. Course fee is about INR 1 LPA.

Marina Maritime Academy, Chennai, established in 2006, is one of India’s best institutions providing various certification, diploma and UG courses in a wide range of disciplines. Some of the courses provided by Marina Maritime Academy are B.Sc in nautical science, marine engineering, diploma in nautical science, diploma in mechanical engineering, graduate in marine engineering, courses in GP rating, course in electro technical officer, BBA in shipping, MBA in shipping, orientation course for catering personnel, etc.

GRT College of Education, Tamil Nadu is a self- financing institution established in 2005, promoted by Ms. GRT Mahalakshmi Educational Charitable Trust. It offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Education. Admission to GRT College of Education depends on the performance of the candidates in the last qualifying examination. The faculty at the college are highly qualified and well experienced.

The college has very dedicated faculty members. BSD CAHS provides world-class facilities for the students.

Sri Krishna Adithya College of Arts and Science was established in 2015 as part of Sri Krishna Institutions. The institute is affiliated to Bharathiar University, Coimbatore, offering 18 UG and PG courses. Admission to the courses offered by the institute is done based on the candidate’s performance.

College_Summary: Sai University, Chennai is a private university established by the Tamil Nadu State Legislature vide the Sai University Act, 2018. The university offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Humanities, Science, Engineering, and Law. Popular courses of the institute include a 4-year B.Tech course in Computing & Data Science, a 5-year Integrated BALLB course, and 1 year LM course across 4 specializations. Apart from that, the university also offers BA (Hons.), B.Sc (Hons), and a 1-year Fellowship Program in the discipline of Law. For admission in the B.Tech, BSc, and BA courses, accepted entrance tests are JEE Main / Pearson Undergraduate Entrance Exam / SAT /ACT. For admission to the BA+LLB course, candidates need to appear and obtain a valid score in CLAT UG/ LSAT whereas LLM admission requires scores of University Entrance Exam / CLAT PG / LSAT India. Apart from this, the university has state of a art infrastructure which provides various facilities to the students. As well as, the university has highly qualified and well-experienced faculty members.

College_Summary: CII Institute of Hospitality – ITC Grand Chola, Chennai is a private institute that works with numerous hospitality organizations. CII serves as a reference point for Indian industry and the international business community. CII (Confederation of Indian Industry) in collaboration with Ecole Hôtelière de Lausanne (EHL) Switzerland, the 127 years old World’s No. 1 Hotel School is offering an exciting hands-on 18 months program to India with their industry partners as ITC hotels and resorts. The duration of VET by EHL Professional Diploma is 18 months and comprises of 3 individual certificate levels, namely: Foundation, Intermediate and Advanced. Each certificate level builds skills on top of the previous and culminates into a Professional Diploma. The program will take place in top ITC hotels such as ITC Maurya (Delhi), ITC Maratha (Mumbai), ITC Grand Chola (Chennai), and ITC Grand Bharat & sonar (Kolkata). Admission to the Professional Diploma courses will be done based on the candidate’s performance in CII Aptitude Test followed by Industry Panel Viva.

Interested candidates can take the application form on payment of INR 1,000 in person or can download the form by paying a sum of INR 1,050. College_Summary: PPG College of Pharmacy is a Coimbatore-based well-developed Private institute that was founded in 2017 under the aegis of P Perichi Gounder Memorial Educational and Charitable Trust. The college is an integral part of the PPG Group of Institutions, approved by the Pharmacy Council of India, and is affiliated with the Tamil Nadu Dr. M.G.R. Medical University. Admission to PPG programs is granted to aspiring students depending on the merit of the preceding year's qualifying exam and the score of entrance tests such as GPAT, AP PGECET, HPCET, or BITS, etc.
